level.text: The CCC Administrator/Director or his/her designee shall review all disciplinary report recommendations regardless of whether there has been an appeal filed.

The CCC Administrator/Director, upon his/her own motion, may reverse the decision, remand the decision to the Disciplinary Team, or modify the sanction imposed whenever such action is warranted based on the record. However, the CCC Administrator/Director may not increase the sanction imposed by the Disciplinary Team.
If the CCC Administrator or designee reverses or remands a decision, he/she must provide a justification for that action.
